name: Balloony
description:
Avoid spikes and collect coins in this tribute to classic NES games.

You play as Balloony the Balloon, here you must transverse dungeon's of spikes to reach the goal, don't touch the spikes or you'll self destruct. You only start with 3 lives, however you can earn more with each 5000 points earned.

Controls:

A,D or Left & Right keys - Move left and right.

Spacebar - Release air to push yourself high into the air.

Enter - Pauses the game.

1 - Toggle screen size.

R- Restart game.

Esc - Close the game.

Characters:

- Balloony. He is a Balloon and the hero of this adventure.

 - Coiny. He is a Coin, collect him for an extra 1000 points!
- Spikey. Its a red hot spikey ball of pain, some have learned how to move. Don't touch.

- Goaly. Not a living entity. Reach this to reach to the next level.
